name: Black Cherry Cheesecake
description: Thought to have originated in Southern Oregon from an unknown breeder, Black Cherry Cheesecake is an indica-dominant hybrid that supposedly crosses Black Cherry Soda, Super Silver Haze, and Cheese. These large, pink-tinged purple flowers smell like cherries and sugar, and possess a flavor that is aptly described by the name. Black Cherry Cheesecake leaves users relatively clear-headed while providing strong, sedating body sensations that can make motivation difficult.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Creative, Happy, Energetic, Stress, Pain, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
